title: Why is the community "toxic"
body:
We all have the opportunity to be nice but if you go on the NA boards 80% of the content is either meme's or circle jerks and a lot of people being rude to riot, requiring the team being hunted having to step in an explain riot's decision making before the community takes it overboard...


Why do so many people choose to be vulgar assholes rather then collaborative contributors to the game?

replies.body:
Not really, while on NA board they don't type with humbleness but a lot speak the rather hard truths of the game's current balance state.

But yeah, as per usual, a lot of crying is on there too, much like any game forum I suppose.
